document_data.name: ''Heart of Avarice''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Heart of Avarice''''' was a [[magic]]al [[dagger]] that was the favored [[weapon]] of [[Abbathor]], the [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[deity]] of greed.<ref name=frcs-3e-p238">
document_data.Description: ''Heart of Avarice'' was [[diamond]]-bladed and had several [[jewel]]s set into its hilt.
document_data.Powers: This dagger had a mighty ''+5'' [[enchantment]]. In addition to doing a huge amount of damage for its weapon type, it was able to uncover the presence of valuable metals within up to {{SI|20|ft}} in each direction. If someone tried to take the dagger for themselves, they would lose a proportion of their overall power and the knowledge they possessed. If they continued to hold it, this effect would continue until the greedy wielder lost all the abilities they had gained.
